towers

Class TowerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • tilemap.Tile
      • towers.TowerBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TowerInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrowTower, CannonTower, IceTower, MagicTower

    public abstract class TowerBase
extends Tile
implements TowerInterface
    This is the abstract class for all kinds of towers. This class includes the common attributes of tower. And it extends Tile class.
    Author:
    Xunrong Xia

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Get the tower's value. The initial value will be same as the cost. A tower's value would be changed if the tower upgrade.
        Returns:
        The value of the tower.

        public boolean getGroupAttack()
        Get if the tower can group attack.
        Returns:
        Return True, if the tower can group attack. Return False, if the tower cannot group attack.

      • setGroupAttack

        public void setGroupAttack(boolean groupAttack)
        Set the groupattack value.
        Parameters:
        groupAttack - The value is true if the Tower can attack a group of monster. The value is false, if the tower cannot do that.

      • setStrategy

        public TowerStrategy setStrategy()
        Based on the strategy type to set the corresponding strategy in TowerStrategy. This uses the Strategy Pattern.
        Returns:
        The strategy will be used by the tower.

      • distance

        public double distance(CritterBase critter)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The distance between the tower and the critter.
